Reviewing Connection Properties

With the application, you can open several views from one or more projects. These projects may all be on the same server configuration or scattered across several different server configurations. To make matters even more complicated, your company may sometimes use the same project names on different servers or the same view names within different projects.

Looking at connection properties makes it easy to identify the server configuration on which you are currently working.

To check connection properties:

  1. Select Project > Connection Properties from the menu bar. The Connection Properties dialog appears.

  2. In the dialog, review the following information:

    • Server description

    • Server address

    • Endpoint

    • User

    • Log on time

  3. Click OK to close the dialog.
